name: Vegetarian Sun-Dried Tomato, Feta, and Walnut Spread
author: Diana Moutsopoulos
summary: This spread, a riff on pesto, is so yummy and versatile. Spread it on toasted baguette slices for an impromptu nibble, toss with pasta, add Greek yogurt to make it into a dip, or spread in sandwiches with your favorite cold meats or roasted veg.
ingredients: 5  sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine sun-dried tomatoes, feta cheese, walnuts, olive oil, oregano, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended
Pour in milk with the processor running, 1 tablespoon at a time, until a spreadable consistency is reached
Serve immediately or chill until needed
